1 
HÒA LÊ  
TPHCM, Vietnam 
SUMMARY 
I have more than 7 years of experience as a DevOps/Linux Engineer in the 
leading technology and product companies. Dedicated experience in the 
Cloud, server IDC and monitoring processes as well as DevOps 
development in Linux systems.   
KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS 
 Core of network protocols 
 Software services 
 Cloud services & 
Virtualization 
 High Availability 
 Hardware 
 Programming 
 Monitoring 
 Automation 
 Databases  
 Project management 
 Microservice 
 Docker & K8S
EXPERIENCE 
Senior Devops Engineer @ Trusting Social | August 2017 - Present 
 Design and implement lifecycle applications from scratch by CI/CD 
 Integrating Github, Slack, Jenkins pipeline and Sonarqube to assure   
quality of products 
 Automation setup services and deploy applications with high 
availability  
 Building a monitoring (prometheus) and log centralization system 
 Training, consulting, providing solutions for dedicated members on 
other countries  
 Collaborating with vendors, telcos and banks to make sure our system 
be  secured and integrating smoothly 
 Developing some internal tools to helps the deployment is more handy  
2 
Senior Devops Engineer @ Mysquar Company | June 2016 - August 2017 
 Design, build and manage a whole systems base on microservice and 
kubernetes to serve a million users. 
 Build, maintain a CI/CD system (jenkins pipeline) and make it more 
friendly, understandably with teams. 
 Develop a chat bot to make the deployment more flexible and 
effective. 
 Build a monitoring system, make an announcement when we have 
issues and show metric graphs to optimise the performance. 
 Build a centralization logs system to search logs, discover and 
resolve issues faster. 
 Build a postgresql DB system with high ability and reliability 
 Collaborate with dev-team to develop new services/products and 
resolve issues 
 Research and implement the new technologies 
System Engineer @ Tiki.vn | April 2015 – June 2016 
 Manage website system e-commerce for high availability, reliability.  
 Setup CI & CD system support auto testing and deploy 
 Schedule backup & restore DB mysql with shell script. 
 Build & load test system for events with high traffic, ccu.  
 Design and setup mysql system replicate failover. 
 Automation setup services (nginx, php-fpm.mysql...) for production, 
staging, test system with ansible. 
 Monitoring with  shinken tools and solves problems 
 Build hardware server and design network system 
3 
System Engineer @ FPT Telecom Company | Oct 2012 – March 2015 
 Plan, design, install, configure, troubleshoot, and manage the Private 
Cloud (hosting for 250+ virtual machines include linux and windows 
OS) 
 Maintain and upgrade ACS system to serves over 01 million 
modems (configure PPoE , firmware…) 
 Install, configure and manage the Web, Mail, Ftp, Database server , 
support Developer for all environments including Development and 
Production 
 Deploy Wowza system to live streaming 200+ camera  
 Working with server hardware (HP, UCS, SuperMicro), building 
RAID, bonding Ethernet, fiber transceiver, etc.   
 Monitoring with tools, analyzes, diagnoses and solves problems 
 Research new technologies, evaluating the effectiveness and 
applying for the products 
DEGREES & CERTIFICATES 
 Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at University of 
National Science (10/2012) 
 Cisco Nexus Test Driver 9000 (NXTD-9k) 
 CCNA at VNPRO Academy  (05/2012)  
SOMETHING ABOUT ME 
 Pros:  
o Ability to quickly pick up and adapt new technology stacks 
o Delivery of committed team projects in a timely manner 
o Passionate, energetic and results focused 
 Cons: 
o I didn’t get any official Linux certificate but I have gained a lot of 
experience when applying it to my job  
o My verbal communication skill is not really excellent 
 My interests are:  
o Reading Book, travelling  
o Sport: football, swimming, running 
o Networking for learning and exchanging experience with others
